ninja.bytecode.shuriken.bukkit.api.nms

Interface PacketListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CatalystHost
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Catalyst16, CatalystPacketListener

    public interface PacketListener
    Hosts a packet listener

    • Method Detail

      • onOpened

        void onOpened()
        Called when the packet listener is opened

      • openListener

        void openListener()

      • closeListener

        void closeListener()
        Close the packet listener

      • addOutgoinKListener

        <T> void addOutgoinKListener(java.lang.Class<? extends T> packetType,
                             PacketHandler<T> handler)
        Add a packet listener for outgoing packets (server -> client)
        Parameters:
        packetType - the packet type
        handler - the handler. The return value denotes weather or not to send the packet to the player or not. Returning true sends the packet, false cancels it.

      • addGlobalOutgoinKListener

        void addGlobalOutgoinKListener(PacketHandler<?> handler)
        Add a packet listener for outgoing packets (server -> client)
        Parameters:
        handler - the handler. The return value denotes weather or not to send the packet to the player or not. Returning true sends the packet, false cancels it.

      • addIncominKListener

        <T> void addIncominKListener(java.lang.Class<? extends T> packetType,
                             PacketHandler<T> handler)
        Add a packet listener for incoming packets (client -> server)
        Parameters:
        packetType - the packet type
        handler - the handler. The return value denotes weather or not to send the packet to the server (handled by craftbukkit) or not. Returning true sends the packet, false cancels it.

      • addGlobalIncominKListener

        void addGlobalIncominKListener(PacketHandler<?> handler)
        Add a packet listener for incoming packets (client -> server)
        Parameters:
        handler - the handler. The return value denotes weather or not to send the packet to the server (handled by craftbukkit) or not. Returning true sends the packet, false cancels it.

      • removeOutgoingPacketListeners

        void removeOutgoingPacketListeners(java.lang.Class<?> c)
        Remove all outgoing listeners for the given packet type
        Parameters:
        c - the packet class

        Remove all outgoing packet listeners
